Package domino_project

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DominoLine
    This interface represents a Line of Tiles on which the tiles are put by players and bot at a Domino Game.
    Player
    This interface represents a Player(Bot or Human) in a DominoGame.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicDominoLine
    This class represents the 'basic' DominoLine according to the idea: matching side of tiles means adding to Line.
    Board
    This class represents the Board on which any type of DominoGame happens.It consists of the line on where the tiles are put on.
    BoardCardinal
    This class represents the board of a Cardinal type of Domino Game.
    BoardHungarian
    This class represents the board of a Hungarian type of Domino Game.
    BoardSolo1
    This class represents the board of Solo1 type of DominoGame.
    Bot
    This class represents a Bot playing a DominoGame implementing Player.
    CardinalDominoLine
    This class represents a Specific DominLine used in CardinalGame of DominoGame according to its rules.
    CardinalGame
    This class represents the Cardinal Type of Domino Game.Its a MultiplayerGame played with a user and Bot(s)(1 or more).The player with the highest double tile starts playing first.The rule is that the touching sides of the tiles put on line have total sum of 7.The double blanks([0,0]) and the tiles with sum=7(e.g. [4,3],[6,1]) are considered baladers.They can be put anywhere reversed or not.Next to a 0 can only be put a balader.The players autommatically draw a tile from stack when they can't put any tile on Line UNTIL THEY CAN.The user can draw as many tiles as they want independently from being able to play or not.
    Human
    This class represents a human-user playing a DominoGame implementing Player.
    HungarianGame
    This class represents the Hungarian Type of Domino Game.
    MultiplayerBoard
    This class represents a Multiplayer Board,a board for Multiplayer Type of Domino Games.
    MultiplayerGame
    This class represents a Multiplayer DominoGame.Multiplayer means Player(user) + Bots(1 or more).For example, Cardinal and Hungarian belong to MultiplayerGame(Solo1 does NOT).It consists of players(ArrayList),board(MultiplayerBoard and a MultiplayerGui for GUI.MultiplayerGame implements runnable(Thread).
    PanelOfTiles
    This class represents a Panel(matrix) Of 28 different Tiles with values in [0,6] in which every Tile exists only once, using an ArrayList.It is an ArrayList Of SetOfTiles(4 rows,7 columns).Imagine as a 2d Matrix which contains the 28 tiles described above.
    SetOfTiles
    This class represents a Set Of Tiles(a number of Tiles) by using an ArrayList.
    Solo1Game
    This class represents the logic of a Solo1 type of Domino Game.
    Tile
    This class represents a Tile of a Domino Game using 2 integers for the values written on it.
    UserInterface
    This class represents the interaction between the user and the console.
